src.description: Path to image (unless a 'media' slot is used)
src.description_zh: 图像路径（除非使用“media”插槽）

height.description_zh: 组件高度（以像素为单位）

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default slot can be used for content that gets displayed on top of the component
slots.description_zh: 默认插槽可用于显示在组件顶部的内容

slots.name: media
slots.description_zh: 用于描述或

slots.name: content
slots.description: Scoped slot for describing content that gets displayed on top of the component; If specified, it overrides the default slot
slots.description_zh: 用于描述显示在组件顶部的内容的 scoped 插槽;如果指定，它将覆盖默认插槽
